name: cldopn
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))

stmt.origin: mpancom(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wcel(c1, ctop))
stmt.pretty: mpancom(c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1), (c2 \ c0)∈ c1, c1 ∈ Top)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))

|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))

stmt.origin: simplbda(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1), wss(c0, c2))
stmt.pretty: simplbda(c1 ∈ Top, c0 ∈(Clsd ` c1), (c2 \ c0)∈ c1, c0 ⊆ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1))), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, ctop), wb(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wcel(cdif(c2, c0), c1))
-| wceq(c2, cuni(c1))

comment: The complement of a closed set is open. (Contributed by NM, 5-Oct-2006.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 22-Feb-2015.)
